shedules.timestamp: last modified time, in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format
shedules.AI_readable: bool: whether the schedule is AI readable (optional)

content.title: the title of the schedule
content.whole_day: bool: whether the schedule is a whole day event
content.remind_before: the time (in minutes) to remind before the schedule starts (optional)

repeat.repeat: bool: whether the schedule is a repeat event
repeat.type: the type of repeat (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly) (optional)

additional_info: any additional information related to the schedule (optional)
this can include links, notes, or any other relevant details
without any specific format, just plain text
content.archive: bool: whether the schedule is archived (optional)
content.archive_time: archived time, in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format
